Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model

Class DevCardGrid

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.common.EventDispatcher
it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model.DevCardGrid
public class DevCardGrid extends EventDispatcher
This class represents a grid of decks of development cards.

  • Constructor Details

    • DevCardGrid

      public DevCardGrid​(List<DevelopmentCard> devCards, int levelsCount, int colorsCount)
      Generates the grid.
      Parameters:
      devCards - the list of all the development cards
      levelsCount - the number of rows of separate decks that represent different development card levels
      colorsCount - the number of columns of separate decks that represent different development card colors.

  • Method Details

    • getLevelsCount

      public int getLevelsCount()
      Getter of the number of rows containing cards of different levels (from 1 to the max level).
      Returns:
      the maximum level of a card (= the number of rows)

    • getColorsCount

      public int getColorsCount()
      Getter of the number of different colors a card can have (= columns of the set of buyable cards).
      Returns:
      the number of different card colors

    • numOfAvailableColors

      public int numOfAvailableColors()
      Calculates how many different colors are available for purchase
      Returns:
      number of different colors that are still available for purchase

    • getDeck

      public Stack<DevelopmentCard> getDeck​(DevCardColor color, int level)
      Getter of the deck corresponding the given color and level.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of choice
      level - the level of choice
      Returns:
      the deck corresponding the given color and level

    • peekDevCards

      public List<List<DevelopmentCard>> peekDevCards()
      Retrieves the top card of each deck (the cards that can be bought during this turn).
      Returns:
      the top card of each deck

    • buyDevCard

      public void buyDevCard​(Game game, Player player, DevCardColor color, int level, int slotIndex, Map<ResourceContainer,​Map<ResourceType,​Integer>> resContainers) throws IllegalCardDepositException, EmptyStackException, IllegalResourceTransactionReplacementsException, IllegalResourceTransactionContainersException, IllegalResourceTransferException
      A player buys a card of a given color and level.
      Parameters:
      game - the game the player is playing in
      player - the player that wants to buy a card
      color - the color of the card to be bought
      level - the level of the card to be bought
      slotIndex - the position of the dev slot where to put the development card
      resContainers - a map of the resource containers where to take the storable resources
      Throws:
      IllegalCardDepositException - Bought card cannot be placed in the chosen player slot
      EmptyStackException - No cards available with given color and level
      IllegalResourceTransferException - if the player cannot pay for the card
      IllegalResourceTransactionReplacementsException
      IllegalResourceTransactionContainersException

    • discardDevCards

      public void discardDevCards​(DevCardColor color, int quantity)
      Removes development cards, so that nobody else can purchase them.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to be discarded
      quantity - the number of cards to be discarded

      public ReducedDevCardGrid reduce()
